mapper.insert: insert into notice(notice_title, notice_content, notice_date, notice_hits) values(#{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, #{notice_date}, 0)
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title= #{notice_title}, notice_content= #{notice_content}, notice_date= #{notice_date}, notice_hits= #{notice_hits}, where notice_no = #{notice_no}
mapper.select: select notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date, notice_hits from notice
